headline: IBM Board Refresh And AI Push Highlight Evolving Growth Priorities
summary: IBM (NYSE:IBM) has appointed PepsiCo CEO Ramon L. Laguarta to its board, adding an executive with extensive large scale transformation experience. The company has rolled out new AI focused initiatives, including an agentic AI solution with e& and AI powered fan platforms for the GRAMMYs. These moves highlight IBM's focus on leadership renewal and expansion of its software, AI, and digital consulting activities. For you as an investor, this combination of boardroom refresh and product...
